SELECT a.MENU_ID , a.MENU_TYPE , a.MENU_NM_EN , a.MENU_NM_KR , a.URL , a.UPPR_MENU_ID , a.ORDR_SN , a.DISP_YN FROM MENU_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN MENU_INFO b ON a.UPPR_MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID AND b.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE a.DEL_YN = 'N'

AND a.MENU_NM_KR LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch1}),'%')

AND a.UPPR_MENU_ID = #{srch6}
ORDER BY a.MENU_ID
ORDER BY a.MENU_ID DESC
ORDER BY a.ORDR_SN
ORDER BY a.ORDR_SN DESC
ORDER BY ORDR_SN
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{startPage}
